title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 170.1 - Statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 170.1 - Statement

State Regulations

The rules contained in this Part, together with the watershed rules and regulations hereinbefore set forth in Parts 100 through 158, have been promulgated to protect sources of water supply dedicated for present or future public beneficial use for domestic and municipal purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
170.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
